name: Trailing Girl
description:
I met three girls I like in my life, and every girl is so sexy.
The first one is a teacher. She is my university teacher. I found that she will go to school when she is resting. I want to know her secrets.
Second, I met her at a Chinese restaurant that I often go to. She is very passionate about me, as if she likes me too.
Third, she is my classmate, she is very lively and cute.

In the game, you will play the boy to track them, and don't be found during the tracking process. When you arrive at the designated place, you can trigger the story and talk to her.
Control the characters to walk, follow the female host, do not be found. Let her have a good impression on you.
